old_man: I am well past my years of hiking, but I can give you this.
The mountain holds beauties beyond your wildest imagination.
Each step you take reveals one more facet of the wonderous tapestry that is your journey. And with your pictures you can forever immortalize each step.
sign: Press C to take pictures of your own.
You can view and download pictures inside the Album menu.
Use arrow keys to pan the camera. Moving or pressing Control will cancel panning.
Note: You can only pan the camera within the extents of the room you are currently inside.
When jumping on a rock you have already jumped from, a colored line will appear showing the trajectory of your last jump.
The color also indicates the strength of your last jump. White is max charge.
Tip: You can stop charging by pressing the Control key
Pro Tip: Check the rock climbing category inside the settings menu for some handy settings.
You can aim with keyboard, turn off the last jump line, or slow down the charging speed of your jump.
When you touch one of these rocks you will attach to it.
Once attached a gray arrow will appear. You can aim this arrow with your mouse.
Holding space will charge your jump and on release you will jump in the direction of the arrow.
Note: When you jump off a rock you cannot control your movement in the air.
A new menu is now available. In the Pause and Main menu you will find the "Secrets" menu, where you can view all the secrets you found.

You can restart the game to find any secrets you did not find.
Note: Secrets will appear with color once you have found them.
